title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 February 2014 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius> has quit  
00:22 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
00:31 <tmortagne> has quit  
01:39 <Denis> has joined #xwiki

07:51 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
07:58 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
08:02 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:05 <mflorea> has quit  
08:26 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
08:38 <vmassol> has quit  
08:41 <tmortagne> has quit  
09:04 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
09:44 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:04 <gdelhumeau> hi mflorea  
10:04 <gdelhumeau> do you tink http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-5.4.x/36/testReport/ are flickers ?  
10:06 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:07 <mflorea> gdelhumeau: I know UserClassFieldTest.testSingleSelection is a flicker, I don't know if VersionTest.testDeleteLatestVersion is, we need to check  
10:08 <gdelhumeau> ok thx :)  
10:10 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: VersionTest.testDeleteLatestVersion could be related to your last commit?  
10:10 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: as I told you on skipe I fixed the issue with delete version  
10:10 <gdelhumeau> ah ok  
10:10 <gdelhumeau> that means  
10:10 <gdelhumeau> we can release!  
10:14 <tmortagne> you think http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-rest/lastBuild/testReport/ is a flicker ?  
10:14 <tmortagne> forget that it's not 5.4...  
10:22 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:29 <gdelhumeau> what about http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-5.4.x/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui/CreatePageTest/testCreatePageWhenNoTemplateAvailable/ ?  
10:29 <gdelhumeau> I don't think it is related to your commit tmortagne  
10:29 <gdelhumeau> and it did not fail before  
10:30 <tmortagne> I don't remember it as a flicker but I don't know all flickers  
10:30 <tmortagne> I don't think it's related to my last commit either but who knows...  
10:31 <gdelhumeau> I'm going to run it locally  
10:39 <gdelhumeau> mvn clean install -Dpattern=CreatePageTest --> BUILD SUCCESS  
10:39 <tmortagne> ok, cool  
10:40 <tmortagne> (but not so cool about the number of flickering we have)  
10:40 <gdelhumeau> but I did not commit platform before  
10:40 <gdelhumeau> (except oldcore)  
10:41 <tmortagne> you mean pull ?  
10:41 <gdelhumeau> sorry  
10:41 <gdelhumeau> s/commit/build  
10:41 <tmortagne> ok but maven downloaded it right ?  
10:42 <gdelhumeau> I don't think the nexus version has your commit  
10:42 <tmortagne> it should  
10:43 <tmortagne> oldcore has been built in the running xwiki-platform-5.4.x  
10:43 <gdelhumeau> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-5.4.x/55/ is still running  
10:43 <tmortagne> according to jenkins  
10:43 <gdelhumeau> ah ok  
10:43 <tmortagne> yes but jars are deployed when built, not at the end  
10:43 <gdelhumeau> then it is all right  
10:44 <tmortagne> msmeria: no new blocker ?  
10:45 <msmeria> tmortagne: on 5.4 you mean ?  
10:45 <tmortagne> yep  
10:46 <msmeria> from what I tested I didn't find anything  
10:46 <tmortagne> ok  
10:46 <msmeria> except for the step 4 report one which you fixed  
10:53 <gdelhumeau> so let is go ?  
10:53 <gdelhumeau> platform is blue  
10:53 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: looks like it  
11:09 <gdelhumeau> release started  
11:34 <sburjan`> has quit  
11:34 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
11:36 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you think you could deploy a 5.4snapshot of your fix for the export on xwiki.org, in order to fix http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XINFRA-146 ?  
11:36 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:36 <evalica> has quit  
11:36 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <tmortagne> vmassol: best is probably to upgrade xwiki.org to 4.5.1  
11:38 <vmassol> if you want to do that I'm fine  
11:38 <tmortagne> since there is other blocker bugs in 4.5.1  
11:57 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
12:27 <andreeapopescu> has left #xwiki  
12:27 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
12:45 <tmortagne> has quit  
13:01 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: hi  
13:01 <msmeria> can you give me more info on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9999 ?  
13:01 <msmeria> I followed all your steps and didnt' see anything out of order  
13:02 <msmeria> didn't\*  
13:02 <msmeria> I tested on 5.4.1-snap  
13:20 <gdelhumeau> In 5.4  
13:21 <gdelhumeau> if I give you a link WikiManager/DeleteWiki?wikiId=wikiToDelete&confirm=1  and if you have the right to delete the wiki, then it will delete the wiki  
13:21 <gdelhumeau> if you click on it  
13:21 <gdelhumeau> But if I am smart I can put this link in an ajax request in any other website you use to visit  
13:21 <gdelhumeau> so you see nothing  
13:21 <gdelhumeau> but your wiki is deleted  
13:22 <gdelhumeau> now, with this fix, you cannot  
13:29 <msmeria> thanks gdelhumeau  
13:48 <gdelhumeau> you are welcome :)  
13:50 <gdelhumeau> msmeria: you could look at XWIKI-10009 if you are interested ;)  
13:52 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
13:53 <msmeria> gdelhumeau: thanks  
13:53 <msmeria> now where should I use this hack ?  
13:53 <msmeria> decisions decisions...  
13:53 <msmeria> :)  
13:53 <gdelhumeau> :)  
14:23 <ClemensR> the 'tr' flag does not show in the 5.4.1 release notes - I am looking into it  
14:23 <ClemensR> (for the updated translations)  
14:25 <ClemensR> hm, now the language is shown but the flag is wrong :p  
14:26 <ClemensR> ah, I see it, the ison is just missing :)  
14:27 <ClemensR> now :)  
14:30 <tmortagne> vmassol: so we want to keep 5.2 branch on jenkins ?  
14:31 <gdelhumeau> thx ClemensR  
14:31 <ClemensR> you are welcome :)  
14:33 <GuillaumeF> has joined #xwiki  
14:34 <vmassol> tmortagne: hmm i think we should keep it a bit longer yes  
14:35 <vmassol> we will be able to remove it when we have a stable 5.4.x  
14:43 <tmortagne> vmassol: does it mean we are supposed to backport bugfixes in 5.2 branch ?  
14:43 <vmassol> tmortagne: good question…  
14:43 <vmassol> I'd say no  
14:44 <vmassol> IMO since we're close to releasing 5.4.2 we should be good  
14:44 <tmortagne> (I'm currently configuring jenkins to be able to choose between java6 and java7 in jobs)  
14:45 <tmortagne> if we don't commit in 5.2 then keeping it in jenkins is useless  
14:45 <gdelhumeau> [ANN] The  maven part of the release is done, you can commit in the 5.4.x branch now :) Thanks !  
14:51 <vmassol> tmortagne: we can take the risk to remove the 5.2.x jobs from jenkins and we'll recreate them if need be  
14:51 <vmassol> but please don't remove the branch in git just yet  
14:53 <tmortagne> I don't plan to touch git, just jenkins  
14:55 <tmortagne> done  
14:58 <tmortagne> 5.4 jobs are now explicitly configured to use java6 and I installed java7 on all agents  
14:58 <tmortagne> java7 is now the default  
15:09 <dpatriche> has quit  
15:23 <vmassol> tmortagne: can you tell me which jar you"ve modified to fix the export issue on 5.4?  
15:23 <vmassol> I really need to make it work now on xwiki.org  
15:24 <vmassol> (and whether it's ok if I put it on xwiki.org)  
15:25 <vmassol> I'm trying to debug http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XINFRA-147 and I need to do some exports  
15:25 <vmassol> evalica: no luck to reproduce locally so far… I'm now trying to copy the full xwikiorg skin locally  
15:25 <vmassol> I even tried on tomcat locally but no luck  
15:26 <evalica> vmassol: …. I tested only yesterday and I also didn't reproduce it … not sure what is the problem  
15:27 <vmassol> I wonder if it could be some front end causing th eproblem such as apache or some other cache tool  
15:33 <tmortagne> vmassol: you could put back old export it's probably the simplest  
15:34 <tmortagne> (this was the point of having this configuration after all)  
15:36 <vmassol> tmortagne: good idea  
15:36 <tmortagne> [WARNING] restarting xwiki.org in 5 minutes  
15:36 <tmortagne> (doing it)  
15:37 <vmassol> ok thanks  
15:38 <vmassol> we'll need to remember to put it back later on...  
15:38 <tmortagne> that's why we need a xwikiorg war IMO with proper configuration right in git  
15:39 <tmortagne> jenkins is not in a very good shape again  
15:46 <tmortagne> just seen that the java version on maven.xwiki.org is jdk1.6.0\_19 which makes it pretty old...  
15:46 <tmortagne> upgraded to last java7  
15:51 <andreeapopescu> has left #xwiki  
15:51 <msmeria> has quit  
16:14 <tmortagne> I have to go, back in 1h

17:44 <gdelhumeau> release done!  
17:45 <gdelhumeau> except pushing commons and rendering to maven central  
17:45 <gdelhumeau> I am waiting for having the rights  
17:48 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
17:48 <andreeapopescu> has left #xwiki  
18:00 <gdelhumeau> [ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-remote-resources-plugin:1.4:process (xwiki-license-resources) on project xwiki-platform-wiki: Error rendering velocity resource. NullPointerException -> [Help 1]  
18:01 <gdelhumeau> what is it happening?  
18:02 <gdelhumeau> and with -U:  
18:03 <gdelhumeau> [ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-enforcer-plugin:1.3.1:enforce (enforce-no-legacy-dependencies) on project xwiki-platform-wiki: Unable to parse configuration of mojo org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-enforcer-plugin:1.3.1:enforce: UnsupportedClassVersionError: Class name which was explicitly given in configuration using 'implementation' attribute: 'org.xwiki.tool.enforcer.XWikiBannedDependencies' cannot  
18:04 <gdelhumeau> vmassol has explained me  
18:04 <gdelhumeau> I still have JDK 1.6
